_meanings:
{@--4@} Death,
dissolution; {#paMcatAM --tvaM gam, --yA#} &c.
means ‘to be resolved into the five
elements of which the body 
consists’, ‘to die or perish’; {#paMcatAM#},
{#tvaM nI#} ‘to kill or destroy’;  
{#paMcaBirnirmite dehe paMcatvaM ca punargate . svAM svAM#} 
{#yonimanuprApte tatra kA paridevanA ..#}; <ls>Ratn. 3. 3.</ls>
